verses.text: Rejoice, the Lord is King! Your Lord and King adore! Rejoice, give thanks, and sing, And triumph evermore:
Jesus, the Savior, reigns, The God of truth and love; When He had purged our stains, He took His seat above:
His kingdom cannot fail, He rules o'er earth and heaven; The keys of death and hell Are to our Jesus given:
Rejoice, in glorious hope! Our Lord the judge shall come, And take His servants up To their eternal home:

refrain.text: Lift up your heart, lift up your voice! Rejoice, again I say, rejoice!
